acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

Accused person is not present. Cause shown for non-appearance of the absentee accused person which is allowed on considered. Pws not present. Perused the CR. Summons to Pws not returned. Issue fresh summons to all the remaining Pws.On perusal of the CR, it is appears the the case is old pending one which deserves priority in disposal. Hence, prosecution is directed to secure and procure the attendance of all the remaining witnesses and to take immediate steps accordingly.
P.O. is on C.L.
